title: Value for money
text: The place is fancy and lovely . Amazing view especially at night with the lights . The waiters were nice , foods were presentable and tasteful . A place to be

title: nice place
text: Wonderful place warm atmosphere and friendly staff . The food was excellent and the roasted duck well tasted ! It is also cheap for its quality

title: Variety of wines
text: Wonderful wine bistro with excellent food ! The place has also countless bottled wines in good prices . The service was great
place: By The Glass wine bar & bistrot

title: AMAZING
text: It was an amazing experience to visit Acropolis ! Very beautiful building , you can also visit the Acropolis museum which is located next to Acropolis

title: Excellent food
text: The food was amazing , kind and friendly staff ! The decoration was beautiful , it is a good choice if you are hungry
